profile:
We design and install residential and commercial systems that integrate Entertainment, Security, Control and Comfort 
- home automation & Smart home
- audio & video/home theater

-Smart lighting and shading
-Golf simulators


We have been in business for 10 years serving homeowners and businesses across Ontario.
Our dedicated team of installers, technicians and electricians take pride in their work and will treat your home like it was their own.
